General.Name: Lucibel
General.Description: Lucibel SA designs, manufactures, and markets lighting products and solutions based on LED technology in France and internationally. It offers LiFi, a light-based internet access solution; VLC, a light-based geolocation and interactions solution; Cronos, a light for well-being solution; and LuciConnect solution. It serves offices/education, health, shops, large scale stores, industry/logistics, and museums/luxury boutiques. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Barentin, France.
